verses.verse: <S%H3588>When<s%> you <S%H3427>sit<s%> <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H9237>dine<s%> with a <S%H4910>ruler,<s%> <S%H995>Consider<s%> <S%H995>carefully<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> you;
And <S%H7760>put<s%> a <S%H7915>knife<s%> to your <S%H3930>throat,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> you are a <S%H1167>man<s%> of [great] <S%H5315>appetite.<s%>
Do not <S%H183>desire<s%> his <S%H4303>delicacies,<s%> For it is <S%H3577>deceptive<s%> <S%H3899>food.<s%>
Do not <S%H3021>weary<s%> yourself to <S%H6238>gain<s%> <S%H6238>wealth,<s%> <S%H2308>Cease<s%> from your <S%H998>consideration<s%> [of it.]

When you <S%H5774>set<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on it, it is <S%H369>gone.<s%> For [wealth] <S%H6213>certainly<s%> <S%H6213>makes<s%> itself <S%H3671>wings,<s%> Like an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H5774>flies<s%> [toward] the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
Do not <S%H9237>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of a <S%H7451>selfish<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H7451>man,<s%> Or <S%H183>desire<s%> his <S%H4303>delicacies;<s%>
For as he <S%H8176>thinks<s%> within <S%H5315>himself,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> he is. He <S%H559>says<s%> to you, <S%H398>"Eat<s%> and <S%H8354>drink!<s%>" But his <S%H3820>heart<s%> is not with you.
You will <S%H9513>vomit<s%> up the <S%H6595>morsel<s%> you have <S%H398>eaten,<s%> And <S%H7843>waste<s%> your <S%H1697>compliments.<s%> <S%H5273><s%>
Do not <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H241>hearing<s%> of a <S%H3684>fool,<s%> For he will <S%H936>despise<s%> the <S%H7922>wisdom<s%> of your <S%H4405>words.<s%>
Do not <S%H5472>move<s%> the <S%H5769>ancient<s%> <S%H1366>boundary,<s%> Or <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H7704>fields<s%> of the <S%H3490>fatherless;<s%>
For their <S%H1350>Redeemer<s%> is <S%H2389>strong;<s%> He will <S%H7378>plead<s%> their <S%H7379>case<s%> <S%H854>against<s%> you.
<S%H935>Apply<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H4148>discipline,<s%> And your <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%>

Do not <S%H4513>hold<s%> <S%H4513>back<s%> <S%H4148>discipline<s%> from the <S%H5288>child,<s%> <S%H3588>Although<s%> you <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> he will not <S%H4191>die.<s%>
You shall <S%H5221>beat<s%> him with the <S%H7626>rod,<s%> And <S%H5337>deliver<s%> his <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H7585>Sheol.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> is <S%H2449>wise,<s%> My own <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> will be <S%H8055>glad;<s%>
And my <S%H3629>inmost<s%> <S%H3629>being<s%> will <S%H5937>rejoice,<s%> When your <S%H8193>lips<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H4339>what<s%> is <S%H4339>right.<s%>
Do not let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H7065>envy<s%> <S%H2400>sinners,<s%> But [live] in the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3605>always.<s%> <S%H3117><s%>
<S%H3588>Surely<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H3426>there<s%> is a <S%H319>future,<s%> And your <S%H8615>hope<s%> will not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> and be <S%H2449>wise,<s%> And <S%H833>direct<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> in the <S%H1870>way.<s%>
Do not be with <S%H9352>heavy<s%> <S%H9352>drinkers<s%> of <S%H3196>wine,<s%> [Or] with <S%H9105>gluttonous<s%> <S%H9105>eaters<s%> of <S%H1320>meat;<s%>

For the <S%H9352>heavy<s%> <S%H9352>drinker<s%> and the <S%H9105>glutton<s%> will <S%H3423>come<s%> to <S%H3423>poverty,<s%> And <S%H5124>drowsiness<s%> will <S%H3847>clothe<s%> [a man] with <S%H7168>rags.<s%>
<S%H8085>Listen<s%> to your father who <S%H1>begot<s%> you, And do not <S%H3205>despise<s%> your <S%H936>mother<s%> <S%H517>when<s%> she is <S%H3588>old.<s%>
<S%H7069>Buy<s%> <S%H571>truth,<s%> and do not <S%H4376>sell<s%> [it,] [Get] <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction<s%> and <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
The father of the <S%H1>righteous<s%> will <S%H6662>greatly<s%> <S%H1524>rejoice,<s%> And he who <S%H1523>begets<s%> a <S%H3205>wise<s%> <S%H2450>son<s%> will be <S%H2450>glad<s%> in him.
Let your father and your <S%H1>mother<s%> be <S%H517>glad,<s%> And let her <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> who <S%H1523>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to you.
<S%H5414>Give<s%> me your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> And let your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7521>delight<s%> in my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For a <S%H2181>harlot<s%> is a <S%H6013>deep<s%> <S%H7745>pit,<s%> And an <S%H5237>adulterous<s%> <S%H5237>woman<s%> is a <S%H9495>narrow<s%> <S%H875>well.<s%>
<S%H637>Surely<s%> she <S%H693>lurks<s%> as a <S%H2863>robber,<s%> And <S%H3254>increases<s%> the <S%H898>faithless<s%> among <S%H120>men.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H190>woe<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H17>sorrow<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H4066>contentions<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H7879>complaining<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H6482>wounds<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause<s%>? <S%H4310>Who<s%> has <S%H2448>redness<s%> of <S%H5869>eyes<s%>?
Those who <S%H309>linger<s%> long <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> Those who <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H2713>taste<s%> <S%H4469>mixed<s%> <S%H4469>wine.<s%>

Do not <S%H7200>look<s%> on the <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it is <S%H119>red,<s%> <S%H3588>When<s%> it <S%H5414>sparkles<s%> <S%H5869><s%> in the <S%H3563>cup,<s%> When it <S%H1980>goes<s%> <S%H1980>down<s%> <S%H4339>smoothly;<s%>
At the <S%H319>last<s%> it <S%H5391>bites<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent,<s%> And <S%H9462>stings<s%> like a <S%H9494>viper.<s%>
Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> will <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2114>strange<s%> <S%H2114>things,<s%> And your <S%H3820>mind<s%> will <S%H1696>utter<s%> <S%H8419>perverse<s%> <S%H8419>things.<s%>

And you will be like one who <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H3820>middle<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> Or like one who <S%H7901>lies<s%> <S%H7901>down<s%> on the <S%H7218>top<s%> of a <S%H2260>mast.<s%>

"They <S%H5221>struck<s%> me, [but] I did not <S%H2470>become<s%> <S%H2470>ill;<s%> They <S%H1986>beat<s%> me, [but] I did not <S%H3045>know<s%> [it.] <S%H4970>When<s%> shall I <S%H9516>awake<s%>? I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H5750>another<s%> <S%H3254><s%> drink."
